plot: Lilliseed has very important parents. They're so important, they have to be away almost all the time. But Lilliseed doesn't mind. Because when they're away, the best thing in the world ...
title: Lille Frø
plot_es: Lilliseed has very important parents. They're so important, they have to be away almost all the time. But Lilliseed doesn't mind. Because when they're away, the best thing in the world ...
